snippet: Leaders of the National September 11 Memorial and Museum are asking a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit seeking to block them from displaying a cross-shaped beam salvaged from the World Trade Center ruins.
abstract: Leaders of the National September 11 Memorial and Museum are asking a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit seeking to block them from displaying a cross-shaped beam salvaged from the World Trade Center ruins.

headline.main: 9/11 Museum Asks for Dismissal of Suit Over Cross
headline.print_headline: Sept. 11 Museum Seeks Dismissal of Lawsuit
